com.interpss.common.msg
Interface IPSSMsgHubBase

All Known Subinterfaces:
IPSSMsgHub
All Known Implementing Classes:
IPSSMsgHubBaseImpl, IPSSMsgHubImpl
public interface IPSSMsgHubBase

InterPSS Message hub, where msg is dispatched to the message listeners contained.

Method Summary

          Add a msg listener to the container.
